main.headline: These largecaps have ‘Strong Buy’ & ‘Buy’ recos and upside potential of more than 25%
main.description: In an already bearish market, there is no dearth of events which are helping bears to further tighten their grip on the markets. However there are few large cap stocks which are finding favor with analysts. ET screener powered by Refinitiv’s Stock Report Plus lists down quality stocks with high upside potential over the next 12 months, having an average recommendation rating of “buy” or  strong buy . The screener applies different algorithms for all BSE and NSE stocks. This predefined screener is only available to ET Prime users.
main.articleBody: The list focuses on select large cap stocks with “strong buy” and “buy“ rating from analysts. After the recent sharp correction, even the most well known stocks from many sectors have made it to the list as the upside potential in them comes close to algorithm fixed minimum target price of gain of 25 percent over next 12 months.
